name: vera
description: Versatile Engine for Rapid Applications - AI-powered full-stack application generator

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../generator && npm install && cd ../deployment && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma db push && npm run db:seed
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend

author: VERA Team
